items.name: Prism Guardian
implicitMods: You take 30% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes
explicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems Cost and Reserve Life instead of Mana
Socketed Gems have 30% increased Reservation Efficiency
flavourText: When blood is paid, the weak think twice.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants evasion to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2575 additional Evasion Rating
You and nearby allies gain 29% more Evasion rating
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants armour to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2051 additional Armour
You and nearby allies gain 49% more Armour
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants bonuses to damage and critical strike chance of spells to you and your allies, and gives a chance to create Consecrated Ground against stronger enemies.
explicitMods: You and nearby Non-Minion Allies have a 10% chance to create Consecrated Ground on Hitting a Rare or Unique Enemy, lasting 8 seconds
You and nearby allies have 39% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance
You and nearby allies deal 15% more Spell Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Ghostwrithe
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Projectile Gems
You take 50% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes
explicitMods: 50% of Maximum Life Converted to Energy Shield
flavourText: Faith springs abundant at the edge of death.

properties.name: Attack, AoE, Movement, Channelling, Physical, Melee

socketedItems.secDescrText: Channel this skill to move towards a targeted location while spinning, building up stages while constantly attacking enemies in an area around you. While channelling this skill, you cannot be knocked back.
explicitMods: 8% increased Area of Effect per 0.1 metre additional Melee Strike Range
Gains 1 Stage every 0.2 seconds while Channelling
Lose 1 Stage every 0.3 seconds while not Channelling
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Launches shards of ice in rapid succession. After travelling a short distance they change to a second form, which moves much faster and pierces through enemies.
explicitMods: Second form has 600% increased Critical Strike Chance
Second form has +49% to Critical Strike Multiplier
Second form has 300% more Projectile Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spells that hit enemies. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 10% chance for Damage with Hits to be Lucky

Supported Skills have Added Spell Damage equal to 135% of
Damage of Equipped One Handed Melee Weapons
If two Weapons are Equipped, each contributes 60% as much Added Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have +150% to Critical Strike Multiplier
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Shaper's Touch
explicitMods: 2% increased Melee Physical Damage per 10 Dexterity
flavourText: By my hand, the inert is given life.
By my hand, that which rots is reborn.
There is nothing that cannot be changed.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Physical, Guard

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that adds to your armour, and can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. When the buff expires or is depleted, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken from the buff. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

75% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to 10% of your Armour, up to a maximum of 5000
Reflects 3000% of Damage taken from Buff as Fire Damage when Buff expires or is depleted
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 70 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 3272 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which increases the armour and evasion of nearby allies, and reduces the critical strike chance of nearby enemies. Gains stages over time while carrying the banner near enemies. Casting the skill again places the banner, ending the mana reservation. Once placed, it becomes more powerful for each stage gained. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
explicitMods: You and nearby Allies have 24% increased Armour and Evasion Rating
Nearby Enemies have 40% reduced Critical Strike Chance
Gain 1 Stage every 0.2 seconds while an Enemy is Nearby

Taunt nearby Enemies for 0.15 seconds per Stage on Placing the Banner
Enemies Taunted this way deal 15% less Damage
Base Duration of 10.00 seconds after being Placed
+1 second to Base Placed Banner Duration per Stage
When placed, 8% increased Area of Effect per Stage
When placed, 1% increased Aura effect per Stage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs a warcry, taunting all nearby enemies to attack the user and granting endurance charges. Gives a brief burst of life regeneration, as well as a buff which grants resistances and physical damage reduction based on your endurance charges.
explicitMods: Counts total Power of Enemies in Range
Buff grants 2% additional Physical Damage Reduction per Endurance Charge
Buff grants +2% to all Elemental Resistances per Endurance Charge
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Vivinsect
explicitMods: +5 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems have 20% reduced Reservation Efficiency
Regenerate 15 Life per second for each Uncorrupted Item Equipped
-2 to Total Mana Cost of Skills for each Corrupted Item Equipped
flavourText: "Fusing the parasite with another ring has manifested unpredictable effects.
I theorise the sacrificial vessel's level of anguish is a key variable."
